Review.Contenu: Listen, I need a source or document to CLEARLY explain how I can use CoinTracker this year for my income taxes. Last year, CT generated reports that were incomplete. I had to generate reports the old way and go back into the previous year to determine all of my profits and losses. I'm not technical so don't comment unless you're used to dealing with techie dummies.

Review.Titre: This tool is dead - reports broken and no new features
Review.Contenu: Despite the premium price tag, they don't support new and popular L1 chains. PulseChain has been out for a month already and still no sign of support by CoinTracker, but Koinly is already implementing it.I feel like I made a mistake putting all my data into a legacy tax tool like CoinTracker.Update: It's gotten worse. They updated their accounting method and now my reports have completely broken.This product is dead.

Customer service does not exist, i am a paying customer and cannot get a reply with a query. Cointracker is not capable of tracking many different cryptos and creates hundreds of pages of errors that require manual review....totally pointless for most people, and a waste of money. If you just have bitcoin or basic tokens, this may work for you. If you use any DEFI, DAO or similar, definately not.

Review.Titre: Transferring NFTs across internal wallets creates incorrect taxable event
Review.Contenu: When I transfer NFTs from one of my wallets to another one of my wallets, it incorrectly creates a taxable event totally skewing the tax calculation. After 27 emails back and forth with their support team over 3 weeks they have no solutions. Don’t bother with this product if you have NFT transactions. All of the work around they suggest have you going into each NFT transaction and calculating the cost basis and realized gains by hand. Not very helpful.

Absolutely zero support from Cointracker.   They don't even offer phone support during tax season.  Their software doesn't compute exchange fees either so you have to do that manually for every transaction or else pay a higher capital gains tax.  I sent an email 10 days ago begging for assistance and still have not heard back.  Save your money....I'm back to doing everything manually.  Complete disapointment after spending $190 on their software.   I notice on their follow up comments below where they told others to drop them a line to get assistance.....then include an email address that no one responds to!   AVOID!!!!

Slow as a turtle!Even after waiting forever to integrate my wallet, the tax report and portfolio balance were extremely inaccurate. Accointing is 100x better than cointracker. Still surprised why would coinbase will fund them with a unicorn status when the product is crap!!!

No credible response to support questions which cannot be answered with a pre-fab response. In my case I reached out several times about _them_ having the wrong daily pricing for an asset, and absurdly skewing my account value (by two orders of magnitude). This was not something I could change. It was a different coin, but imagine if they'd arbitrarily decided a bitcoin was worth $1,000,000 even though it's only worth $19,000, and didn't listen well enough to the support request to even check to see if they'd been propagating a mistake. Why should anyone trust them with tax filing???FWIW, Ticket ID #127934 was the September follow-up to the unanswered ticket ID #126906 from August.

Review.Titre: I have been waiting on CoinTracker for…
Review.Contenu: I have been waiting on CoinTracker for several days to respond to my ticket.  Their sync on quantity and cost basis is completely inaccurate.  At first the platform looks brilliant but when you start connecting wallets all the bugs start presenting themselves unless you take the data for face value.  A lot of users will have issues on the lack of accuracy.  If you are concerned with ever getting audited or actually making trades based on the data you are getting from cointracker, be warned....

Review.Titre: 9 times out of 10 for the past month…
Review.Contenu: 9 times out of 10 for the past month the site is completely unusable. I cannot view my dashboard, cannot view my tax center information, can't view wallets, can't even log out. I have tried multiple times to create a support ticket to no avail. I've paid hundreds of dollars for this platform and wasted money on a CPA consultation and couldn't pull up my cointracker information.

Terrible, terrible service. If all you use is Coinbase, then it *might* work.  If you use anything else, prepare to spend more time counting your crypto than spending your crypto.  NO DEFI SUPPORT.  WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT IMAGINABLE.  HUGELY OVERPRICED.

My account shows prices that the coin never historically reached. My Cost basis is way off. I contacted support a few times two or three months ago no response. I finally gave up and went elsewhere. I do get a confirmation e-mail, though, saying that they received my support request, thank you for that, but it stops there, so it's not as if they can't contact me. I get my bills regularly from them every month, very efficient, congratulations. Maybe billing should change agents with support.

If your like me and do a decent amount of small time crypto buying, but never selling, they're gonna rob you. I have about $40 taxable transactions, and they want to charge me $200 just to get my report.And don't even get me started on the rocket science game of importing CSV's and changing their formatting manually, for a common broker like BlockFi.

Cointracker arbitrarily changed my UMA to LUMA. LUMA does not exist at the GEMINI exchange. By renaming it to LUMA it can't sync, and according to cointracker I no longer own any UMA which is blatantly wrong. Multiple support tickets over the last month has gotten zero results or responses. Taxes will be wrong this year.2/6/22 Has now been three months and my UMA still is missing replaced by LUMA TOKEN (wich I don't own). As far as I can tell they are no longer responding to anyone.

I have subscribed to Cointracker though Coinbase recommendation and the software is such a piece of junk. The earning/loss is way off over $20,000.00 and I reached out for support to correct the errors but nobody fixed it or contacted me. Really? I demand for a full refund or I am going to call me credit card company to get a refund for a illegitimate bussiness not holding up the value.

Clunky difficult to review transactions. False sales pitch to lure people in with the pitch of "import transactions, and done!" not true at all. Features for accountants are worst of all the competitors. Overpriced, and only want more money for less features

The product itself is fine, but customer support is AWFUL.  I have paid for the tax package for the last 3 years and this year I have a question about a coin not importing correctly, and no one will respond.  Sent the question January 26th and its now February 14th.  Nothing...why would I give you more money this year when you have horrible customer service?

slowest app. just want to you to pay for assistance just blocking out information pretty much useless app im not sure how they are promoted for off coinbase taxes arent that hard but clicking to download a form 30 times is ridiculous and nothing happens please shut this website down.

USER BEWARE!!!! As a paying customer with an active monthly subscription my requests for updates were actively ignored and I had to wait 53 days for a responce from cointracker. I hope I am the only customer they have treated this way, but I find that hard to believe. I cannot post pictures here but I am more then willing to provide screenshots of our email discussion to prove i am not exaggerating.

Review.Contenu: F**** i have more than $300+k in my cointracker portfolio but after paying more than $6k*+ and complying the requirements to get my money cointracker held my money to withdraw and ask me to pay another $5,400.00 to release my profit and they giving me 72hrs to pay or else i am going to lose my profit . wow! they are now threating!.. i think i need to use my political connection to STOP this kind of transaction

Do not trust their security.   Scammers were able to take over my account.   I was not in control of it.  Deposits appeared which I did not make. Holdings of BTC were listed.  How could this happen?  No responsibility taken by Cointracker

A number of tokens are highly inaccurate.They show I own a token called Pocket Bomb? I have never bought or done anything with that token before.Others show incorrect values or the number of tokens is way way off. 500 Trillion for one token when I only have 13 Billion.

They have 2 major issues.  First off, they do not currently add fees to your cost basis.  This is so fundamentally flawed and will make you pay more taxes.  It was brought up on their forum 18 months ago and is still not fixed.  Customer service has told me it is fixed multiple times (it's not), yet people are still complainingg on their forums, reddit, twitter, etc.Next, they have issues with transferring funds from multiple Coinbase Pro wallets.  I keep long and short term wallets under the same accounts.  The errors are for partial transactions and make no sense.   This service is terrible and you should not use it.

Review.Titre: Gone downhill over last year - stay away
Review.Contenu: Unreal how bad this company has fallen in 1 year. I have 5 outstanding tickets over 6 months. No one has ever followed up to fix any of them. Even the most basic functions are riddled with errors now. Some tokens have no value, some show wrong values in one spot and correct values in others, some tokens have random name changes or don’t show at all. They hide posts in forums that are critical and never follow up in their own forums but so read them everyday. There are a dozen free apps that’s track things more accurately and the whole purpose of paying for this service is taxes which you can’t trust since so many things are wrong.

I’ve sent 5 emails a month ago no response.

In the future if the companies do not have a customer support phone number, I’m not interested!

Functionality is good but customer support is dismal. I subscribed to this software but up to now I have not received my full reports. I've emailed customer support for two months. It still hasn't been fixed. This is the worst customer service I've experienced! It's like having no customer service at all!

Instead, they will reply to this review below and let the mountain of tickets grow while the founders toast drinks and laugh in Bermuda.The IRS is going to be coming after me soon due to the monstrous issues with this software, so I may too have to join the founders in Bermuda.Nonetheless, If you have any money at all in crypto do not use this software unless you like pain and your favorite movie is hellraiser.  Instead, go to tokentaxTo the poor contractor tasked with replying to this, please instead go fend off the support tickets.

Review.Contenu: For solana their service was not working and total garbage, the tool told me get a higher plan(250$) so I did but the result was the same.The 100% refund policy seems to be scam since they dont answer to support requests since 3 weeks.

Review.Titre: Costs a LOT more than they say (check review)
Review.Contenu: They wanted me to spend $3,199 on their service. How? They charge $199 and didn't account for over $3K in deductions for exchange fees. It took me SIX DAYS to sift through the transactions, manually calculating fees and filling out 8949s. I could have done this with a printout from my exchange. CoinTracker is a complete scam and a waste of money. They ought to be embarrassed to provide such a poor service that takes money from people TWICE.

Review.Titre: A more friendly tax management policy…
Review.Contenu: A more friendly tax management policy would be appreciated.

I am deeply disappointed by the product. The software is full of errors and flawed. Nearly every of my transaction is incorrect. I sent in my record download from Coinbase and request the support team to look over and correct it. I am not sure they will be able to do it.

Review.Titre: Expensive, no support, no exchange fees, and hard to use.
Review.Contenu: Seems convenient at first, but it's:1. Expensive;2. Doesn't support many exchanges and makes you painstakingly format CSV files yourself to import them;3. Useless email support never gets back to you during tax season and just says "oh sorry, we're busy." There is NO PHONE NUMBER and they try to just send you to their forum instead of even helping you via email.4. You have to put in exchange fees manually, or else you get hit with them and pay extra capital gains.5. Every feature is an extra charge, so it seems like you get very little for your money.At this point I just want to cancel for a refund

Review.Titre: Customer services is the biggest let…
Review.Contenu: Customer services is the biggest let down of Cointracker. I contacted them via their website about 1 month ago, no response, sent a follow up query, no response. Because the customer service is severely lacking, I recommend that you do not use their service at the moment. I have used their tax reports in the past without issues but my current tax report however shows errors when it comes to Binance trades in specific.If you can't make a certain feature work properly, don't add it to your system or atleast test to see if the features work before giving your customers the impression the features work as they should.Disappointed but I am going to wait for a response from customer services because I have paid for the tax plan - if not, I will be making a credit card section 75 chargeback as the service I bought is not fit for purpose.

Review.Titre: What is going on with their support
Review.Contenu: What is going on with their support, I was charged $99 for their service and have not been able to use it (the website doesn't recognize that I paid for the "hobbyist version") and I have still not heard back from anyone at Cointracker over email. Overall seems to be a useful platform, but I am a bit annoyed about all of this.

TERRIBLE app, do not waste your time or your money.  After literally 100s of hours trying to correct the mistakes that this app continues to make and CREATE, I am done.  I will have to file whatever amendments on my tax forms because the trash cointracker literally does not track your coins correctly from their own coinbase owned company. Nor do they accurately track the csv files that you have to provide for certain exchanges.  It loses your transactions, or puts them in wrong chronological order, which can cause coins to  look like they are running in the negative when in fact they are not. not if, but WHEN you come into issues, you will have 0 customer support. Doesnt matter if you contact them direct via email, or through facebook, twitter, you will get nowhere.  I am out $600 and a LOT of my time and I still do not have a semi accurate matching portfolio  from actual to cointrackers fantasy to provide to my CPA, which will do doubt cost many more hours of paid time for them to decipher the trash that cointracker spits out. Guaranteed to have the IRS red flag your account with the misinformation that this app will provide.

No support at all. You can send mails and mails but you will not get any answer in order to solve the multiple bugs they have. It does not matter if you have paid for a cheap or an expensive plan, you will not get support at all. I do not recommend to choose this company, they will get your money and run away.

Garbage product.  Absolute filth.  Totally screwed up my TurboTax.  All cost basis is wrong and the only way to fix it is to go through each of the 500 transactions and correct manually.....on TurboTax's SLOW platform.   Do not even mess with this.  As a matter of fact, stay away from Crypto or never withdraw it.  The IRS is making sure that it is a pain in the ass to file.

CSV file cannot be uploaded..Everytime i tried to upload .csv file it says unsupported. You have to convert the csv file to the cointracker csv format which is pain in the ass if you have multiple platform. The price is too expensive. They need to reduce the price..

I have £148k in an "other transaction" wallet that I can't access. I want to withdraw the funds and they are asking for an upfront payment of £20k+ within 48hrs or I will lose the funds! Do they think people are sitting on this kind of cash? I've offered that they take it from the account and release the rest but they are refusing! They also say the £20k+ is refundable!! I also have to do it in btc to a wallet of their choosing! My bank crypto dept and scam dept say this is a scam. Customer service is a joke. They even called ME a schyster!!

This one shows a bunch of forms, but then it shows me some that are mostly blank, and some that have info filled out. So do I print all of them? Are the forms shown tailored to my account activity, or am I supposed to choose the forms to fill out myself and do them? No one anywhere is making this clear. If I get into any IRS problems I'm going after everybody, including coinbase for being so vague on why I'm not just seeing some 1099 form or something. Why so much more complicated now? This sort of thing ruins crypto. I might call it quits.

Review.Titre: Joke - They charge $99/month and provide ZERO support.
Review.Contenu: So I've been using Cointracker for a few years. I first found out about them because Coinbase/TurboTax shoved it down my throat when I was doing my taxes. Anyways, fast forward a year or 2. Portfolio grew. I was on more wallet/exchanges. So, I upgraded my subscription with Cointracker. What a waste of money that was. For 90% of things, Cointracker does well. I will admit that. But there remains 10% that is filled with bugs/errors. That 10% ultimately impacts my entire portfolio and makes the app useless. What's the point of accurately tracking 65% of my portfolio? There is simply 0 support provided from Cointracker. They have a forum which they say that they monitor closely. But I tested that and made a post asking any single employee from Cointracker to comment. None did. Shocking, I know. And the post was filled with very disgruntled Cointracker customers. One guy even told me to run for the hills because Cointracker is actively selling your data to third parties. (Scary).Just do yourself a favor and avoid. Somebody set up this website and just keeps it running to pocket the monthly fees from suckers like myself. There is ZERO support. Furthermore, the graphs and data they provide look like a little kid made them. Very, very rudimentary.
I just received a message that my email and password from this account was discovered on the deep dark web.
Avoid Cointracker!  Nonexistent customer service.  Totally screwed up my capital gains for 2022.  Horrible company!

Zero support. I have paid them over 300 in fees and their calc are off. I logged the errors and asked for support and it has been a month of radio silence. Horrible company.

Score 1 star for at least responding within a few weeks to emails sent to support. However, Cointracker cannot capture NFT activity with ANY accuracy. I am a Polychain Monsters (PMON) collector. Transfers of NFT's from one of my wallets to another result in Cointracker reporting gains or losses when indeed an NFT transfer should NOT result in a gain or loss. They advise they are aiming to hire additional staff and to eventually address NFT reporting failures but meantime more issues arose with staking rewards reported incorrectly and transaction numbers also incorrect. Cointracker support told me someone had altered the tax capture period from a fiscal (Australian tax year) to a calendar year but WHY didn't this error get detected and fixed before releasing the update? This is dreadful quality control. Even to this date, and more than a month since the error, transaction numbers and staking reward values continue to be reported incorrectly so it would seem they still have not acted on changing the reporting period back to fiscal year. Cannot rely at all on Cointracker to support my tax return despite the AU Tax Office having certified Cointracker as an acceptable reporting program. Cointracker are apologetic but apologies do not address or fix the issues. If you are into NFT's I think you will also encounter grief if you are going to rely on Cointracker for tax reporting.

On April 9th I had all my tax forms organized and ready to file with the IRS when I noticed an issue with CoinTracker. After I had reconciled my 2020 crypto transactions, it appeared that my 2017 and 2018 gains and losses per CoinTracker no longer reconciled with the tax returns I had filed for those years using the CoinTracker service. This was alarming to me, as I did not want to file my 2020 return only to have to amend it later because somehow CoinTracker's cost basis for prior years shifted from the time when I had originally prepared my prior year returns using the CoinTracker service. Interpretation: the way CoinTracker is calculating the basis for my 2017 and 2018 transactions today is different than the way the service calculated the basis for the same transactions when I originally used the service a while back.After the tax deadline had passed, on 5/19 I received a boiler plate email from the Head of Customer support saying that they only have 3 people working on customer service and that if I still have a question, then to reply. It has been over a week since then and still no update on my issue. I paid $150 for this service and have not only gotten no value out of it, it is now costing me penalties because of 1) erroneous calculations and 2) late filingsI would not recommend this service to anyone.

Review.Titre: Used to be great, not so much anymore
Review.Contenu: Well have been trying since November of 2021 to get my UMA fixed and finally had to file my taxes showing I own no UMA but instead LUMA TOKEN (which does not exist at the GEMINI exchange). Fortunately all of the purchase dates, amounts, etc are correct, just for the wrong crypto.THIS CAN NOT BE EDITED as when you enter UMA at GEMINI cointracker software does not allow it as it erroneously thinks UMA at GEMINI does not exist while the only option is LUMA which of course in reality does not exist at GEMINI. Strangely enough Cointracker can’t sync a crypto that does not exist at GEMINI ! Well I wonder why? Maybe UMA is a new token at Gemini, nope have had it in years past on cointracker. Maybe I am mistaken and LUMA TOKEN is the crypto I own, noooopppeee it does not even exist at the GEMINI exchange.Maybe some genius at Cointracker changed GEMINI UMA to GEMINI LUMA so UMA is no longer even an option…by JOE we may be on to something now. Something that should be so very, very easy for support to fix but alas after five months and numerous attempts to get COINTRACKER to address it …nothing. AND SUCH AN EASY FIX.Jessica, I got your texts this A.M. however taxes are filed for 2021 with printout of GEMINI UMA transactions along with the highlighted and date/cost matches on LUMA TOKEN as reported by COINTRACKER along with a brief note on COINTRACKER SUPPORTS lack of response on correcting this.We did manage to get locked out of our old account () so I kind of expected this issue to get corrected on what cointracker would have seen as a new account but…again not true. All UMA transactions at GEMINI listed on COINTRACKER as… you guessed it LUMA TOKEN again. Now of course we no longer have access to our tax records at COINTRACKER but fortunately we downloaded them prior to losing access.After using COINTRACKER for several years and being very happy with it, this last year has been troublesome. I find it may be time to move on as COINTRACKERS support is…welll…not very good and when it comes to taxes the one thing the site exists for should be correct.And COINTRACKER is still being recommended as a top tax site for 2022 ????

Review.Titre: Not great, though it seems like decent option
Review.Contenu: After struggling with their broken importers, writing code to convert CSV files, and having to look on external sites for help I was able to get it to work! This should be the highest priority.No free trials to see what a subscription would get you (e.g. gains analysis). Nearly unusable for taxes and gains since there is no disambiguation of transactions between owned wallets. This screws up taxes.I've looked into and used 6-10 platforms and I'll say that CoinTracker, though has a long way to go regarding import and other features, seems to be on the right track.

This app struggles significantly with Cardano transactions. It fails to differentiate between in-wallet transfers and wallet-to-wallet transactions that trigger auto-withdrawal of rewards. Moreover, it can't properly handle Cardano's eUTXO model where a single transaction can involve multiple addresses. This is a basic functionality that other apps have been handling for years.

Review.Titre: Too buggy to be fit for purpose
Review.Contenu: Too buggy to be fit for purpose. Biggest bug is incorrect account balancing which results in some wallets showing negative balances (balance shouldn't be less than 0) .  This has been flagged to the company since last year, search for "negative balance" on their community forum and see the relevant posts. The company have done nothing to address this. For these reasons, I'm out.
Inaccurate asset balance in Daily Portfolio update.

The system itself looks excellent.  THe problem however is that I have 2 support tickets that have been logged for some weeks now, with no reply.  And one of the tickets is quite significant and really make the product useless for me until it's fixed.  (I have a crypto that's being incorrectly categorised as a different cryto, which means the pricing is incorrect).  Really hope someone at CoinTracker can fix this ASAP.

The pricing for their tax product is based on the number of transactions you do in a year, but there's not a clear mapping between trades I do and transactions that they count. I expect that if I place one limit order, it will count as one transaction for the purposes of pricing. In practice you can only place 5 or 10 limit orders in a given year before being bumped up into the Premium ($199) plan.

Review.Titre: Capital gains computations don't include exchange fees
Review.Contenu: I have been checking out the program for taxes. I linked my coin base pro account and all the transactions where transferred. The issue I'm having is when coin tracker computes the capital gain for a transaction the exchange fees are not included which makes the gain higher than it should be. The fees are listed for each transaction, it appears the program just doesn't include. As I check other reviews of coin tracker it seems others are having this issue as well. I would purchase the program if that issue get's fixed but without that feature there would need to be a lot of hand calculations to fix

Too buggy. I'm always seeing incorrect values, and now certain coins aren't even appearing despite support saying it's fixed, and all my balances are off now creating a tax and reconciliation nightmare. It's also incredibly expensive for the level of service received. At the start I was getting good service, but now that the crypto boom has picked up the service is atrociously slow.

Review.Titre: Signed up to the free version but…
Review.Contenu: Signed up to the free version but having a little trouble syncing my ledger polkadot as a wallet.  Raised a support ticket but after seeing all the reviews here it looks like I will be waiting months for a response! I thought the price versus other trackers was very expensive and literally about to type my card details in.... but will now avoid thanks to these reviews.  Lack of customer service especially when you're paying a premium is a big red warning flag.Also on their website they have a the trustpilot logo along showing they have 5 star ratings which is false as their rating is 3.9 so they lie!

I have been using CoinTracker for a few weeks now and my overall experience has only been problems. I subscribed to their Enthusiast plan which includes Email support and their customer service team never replied to my (3) emails about any of my issues. They charged my account for their tax solutions $179 and a monthly charge of $14.00 and their system never updated correctly my asset buy/sell. After I deleted my wallet and reconfigured it to a new wallet Cointracker assumed I was a new customer, even though, I signed in with the same login, now logged in they want me to update my subscription and pay more money. Cointracker is a new company for me, so I assume you get what you pay for!

Review.Titre: Good at cost basis, but expensive and bad at most everything else
Review.Contenu: The good: It connected to my coinbase & Kraken accounts fine, and pulled down (almost) all transactions very well -- had a hard time with eth.2, where I had to manually fix those.For tax time, I was able to download a CSV file with the detail of all transactions with cost basis they calculated. I didn't want to purchase the higher-priced version of TurboTax required for the direct download of transactions into it, so CSV file solution worked.The bad: They want to charge a high monthly fee for you to see details of all your investments if you want more than the basics of "current value".For taxes, they charge $200 above what you'd pay to see your current ledger. I completely gave up on using their downloadable IRS forms, as they have many blanks or WORSE: COMPLETELY INCORRECT DATA FOR FORM 8949. When I contacted customer service they acknowledged they have a bug and "please upvote if you want us to address it".I'm going to try TaxBit, which was recommended by Dan Held, a popular crypto blogger. It's considerably cheaper, and has much better reviews than CoinTracker.
Figures constantly change. Accounts stop linking and are down for weeks. Has it's good points but overall a pretty disappointing service.

Having errors such as coins showing on Cointracker that I have never purchased or received, and incorrect balances showing after importing information. I like and appreciate the idea of Cointracker, but it's not as easy as I thought it would be, which mostly is a fault of the exchanges.

Inaccurate balances.  No mechanism to remove invalid coins with invalid price information, which makes finding additional invalid coins with invalid price information extremely difficult, and difficulty increases as inaccurate balances accumulate (balances reporting ~ $200 million higher than they should be) because they're already so far off they are completely useless.  Company is aware of issues and have been ignoring customer requests for years.Tax software integrations are nice, but imports are in no way accurate.Specifically, when you receive airdrops of crap coins with misrepresented values, there is no way to ignore these coins, so the total value of assets shown ends up being nowhere close to the actual value (ie $12,000 wallet total ends up showing as $300,000,000)
Poor data performance with wallets. Will not pay for until they show they can get it right. Even data from coinbase does not match. 😥
Horrible never ending 'sync' and updating cost basis times
very weak reconciliation of cross-platform transactions, slow updating and often freezes cost basis

Review.Titre: Can't Get Support in Tracking Portfolio
Review.Contenu: I am a new user with a Tax Report subscription. The application was everything it claimed but I had a glitch with attaching one exchange to my portfolio. So I tried to upload its CSV file without success, and then tried to create and upload my own CSV file...again without success. I uploaded the files I used to the Cointracker website asking for help, and also sent emails. This has gone on for a month and there has been no response from Cointracker.

Review.Titre: If you use Bitrue, do not use this service.
Cointracker is not one of the best tax…
Review.Contenu: Cointracker is not one of the best tax calculators, they have made it difficult to figure correct transactions, among other issues.

Review.Titre: Tracking buys and sells only would be better
Review.Contenu: Originally, I was thrilled to find a service that would help me track my transactions. But when tax time came and I accessed my account, I was extremely disappointed to see that they count every small interest posting as a transaction! so I have never accessed the site again and I hope to God they’re not charging me because as far as I know, I have no account with them any longer I find the service useless unless you pay higher fees.

Review.Titre: I like how much easier it is to have…
Review.Contenu: I like how much easier it is to have all your portfolios in place.

Review.Titre: needs support for cro network and…
Review.Contenu: needs support for cro network and tangem wallet

Review.Titre: Coinspot sales not linking to dashboard
Review.Contenu: Still a couple of small issues affecting my portfolio

Review.Titre: I have noticed the transactions don't…
Review.Contenu: I have noticed the transactions don't update even after 12hrs at least binance transactions. This could be improved. I can only see transactions from 4 days ago.Also, I can't add binance futures wallet to the list.I want to use this app to have an external proof of my transactions in binance and other exchanges in case of any problem with the exchange.Have you product owner from Cointracker thought about this use? I guess you should as no platform offers this option

Review.Titre: The customer service has really been disappointing.
Review.Contenu: The customer service has really degraded over the past few years. Response time is very slow or non-existent when I request help resolving an issue. The platform has constant issues synching my wallets and keeping accurate track of certain cryptocurrencies. This results in inaccurate daily portfolio management. I feel the value of this service is no longer what it was when I originally subscribed to it.

I payed for 2 full years, £400. I imported data from my CSV files that i downloaded from my official exchanges, and my calculations are wrong. My Gifts and Rewards are not automatically marked when i imported them. None of my tickets are getting answered. I asked for a refund a week ago, but still nobody replied to me, and they say they have a 30 day refund window.Update: i got a refund. And my tickets got answered, it just takes a few weeks.

Review.Titre: Well I would like to see USDT on TRON…
Review.Contenu: Well I would like to see USDT on TRON network being tracked.
Defi doesn't track well in this tax software as well as portfolio tracker. Major challenges/hurdles still to be addressed.
Easy to use, however connecting wallets could be easier or better explained.
Very confusing to set up. Takes a long time. Once you’re connected to your exchanges, the tax reports generate quickly and come in very useful!

Got spam email, never signed up, no way to say this is incorrect.To be clear the issue is that there is no "I never signed up" link in the email.Edit: as they have cleared this up I will update to neutral.

Review.Titre: Great good job so far wish though that…
Review.Contenu: Great good job so far wish though that everything was more equal for everyone who doesn't have a pro plan and that it was also more on a live market basis not one that takes a long time to get with the same time of trade or buy or mined coin other than this great work and cnt wait to c wat is next to come

Review.Titre: Great so far, only have one issue...
Review.Contenu: Just started using cointracker and ive already seen some obvious pros and cons. If the support team gets back to me and helps me resolve the issue that im having then there would only be pros.Pros: I have a multitude of wallets and exchanges that I use for varius cryptocurrencies so tracking all of them has been cumbersome and frustrating but almost all of my wallets have been able to sync to cointracker! I originally started using cointracker solely for tax purposes but once I saw that cointracker also provides a live dashboard with all of my portfolio consolidated and tracked together I realized cointracker has the potential to be a one stop shop for tracking my positions. cons: the only downside ive found so far (again, only a new user here so I will likely find more undesirable aspects) is adding wallets. Most of my wallets synced no problem but the one that is most important to me does not add. This particular wallet is on ledgerlive (Algorand). It doesnt make sense to me why it doesnt sync because my other ledgerlive wallets managed to sync after a few tries but this one does not. I followed the instructions on the "add wallet" page and when I click "add wallet" nothing happens. I have this issue with 2 wallets currently. I sent the support team an email through their website and if they get back to me in a timely manner and are able to resolve this then I will gladly update this to a 5 star review. And at that point i believe the fee for cointracker's services will be more than warranted and worth every penny. Until then, Cointracker will continue to NOT be a one-stop-shop for me as I will have to use multiple platforms and websites to track/manage my investments as well as my taxes.

Review.Titre: Some personal addresses can't be added…
Review.Contenu: Some personal addresses can't be added saying it has to many transactions. And some times I don't get notified on a transaction immediately.
Wallets take forever to synchronize properly, and huge delay (days) for balances to update.
Good day,I have iam struggling  to make connections  or link of my trade accounts..please help

Review.Titre: Fee tier during tax time could be high
Partlly does the job but fees  for extra services are excessive
Review.Contenu: I bought this to track my crypto exchanges for tax purposes and track all my crypto investments in one portfolio.Partly does the job but fees for extra services are excessive. To track a decent amount of trading is $169/yr for just tax purposes. To track the portfolio is $99/month. This is ridiculous. They have access to the transactions for tax purposes which means they have access to the data to track the daily portfolio. The access is via API so it's continuous. I will not continue my subscription next year.
Don`t like the web app. Mobile is ok!

Review.Titre: Love it but I am new and learning

Review.Contenu: Overall very easy to use.  Connecting my Trust Wallet with my CointTracker account is a bit tricky.  The blockchain dropdown list selected was automatically cleared after pasting my Trust Wallet address into the address box.  But the webpage highlighted the wrong input address field which was not blank.  The blank field was the dropdown list of the blockchains to select.  So, I had to reselect the Binance Smart Chain on the dropdown list to add my Trust Wallet to my CoinTracker account.  They should have fixed the software issue on the webpage front-end interface.
It's all i want for my litttle experience :)

Review.Titre: ease of use and clarity of information
Always differs a little bit from Ledger…
Review.Contenu: Always differs a little bit from Ledger Live (nano x).

Review.Titre: refresh the portfolio value more often
Review.Contenu: It would be great if I could refresh the portfolio value more often. Seems like I'm only able to about every 15min.

+ : Great to get a nice overview quickly from all my wallets/exchanges.+ : great interface for portfolio and transaction views+ : mobile app- : sometimes, there is a mixup in coin names ($BIG apparently denotes both Big Eyes and Dark Land Survival) to which the workaround is not always effective.- : some coins don't sync from some exchanges (behaviour seems rather random)

I've been using Cointracker since 2017. I would give a rating higher than 4 stars  if it were not for past syncing problems.  I am a buyer and holder and I only use mainstream exchanges like Coinbase.I think Cointracker fixed some bugs lately and I believe it fixed the syncing problems. So, I am happier with the product.Keep up the good work Cointracker.

What I love most about CoinTracker is their integration with TurboTax. As an American Citizen, this is extremely important.Keeping track of all your trades can be challenging and the crypto services industry is very new. Cointracker has made my life easier.

Review.Titre: CoinTracker best Tax SW i used so far!
Review.Contenu: simple to use, nice ux. only thing i wish would be improved is customizable basic tax rules, as each country is different and therefore no other chosen country really fits.

Review.Titre: Need to make an automated interface…
Review.Contenu: Need to make an automated interface that recognize when a coin is placed in a wallet.  Currently I have to manually enter those finial transactions.
Very good crypto tracker, but the free version should enable a little more feature.

Good tracking of transactions but capital gains are NOT being calculated correctly!  Please (1) add exchange purchase fee to Cost Basis, and (2) subtract exchange sales fee from gross proceeds.  Your capital gains numbers are wrong, and too high.  This will generate higher taxes due to the IRS.  You have an evolving product, but this is a HIGH PRIORITY change for all your USA Coinbase Pro customers.   Thanks, Cal
Add more API connections and exchanges. Love the graph. Easy to view my status across majority of the exchanges that I am on.

This has been a lifesaver for compiling crypto tax returns. I just hand over to my accountant and she can easily integrate. Adding a new wallet not already in coin tracker is not intuitive and caused much frustration. Response to my query regarding costs was immediate, which I appreciated (maybe because I’m in Australia). The portfolio tracker is way too expensive for a non-trader.Mostly good. I’m sticking with it (at least until someone else offers cheaper tracking).

Review.Titre: Good way to have a quick look at your wallet.
Review.Contenu: Nice way to manage a portfolio and have a quick look on how it's going.

Review.Titre: With multiple buys and sells of some of…
Review.Contenu: With multiple buys and sells of some of the Cryptos, I frankly don't know how I could have kept up with the bookkeeping which does so effectively by CoinTracker. Lack of the 5th Star in the rating is strictly due to the problems integrating with Turbo Tax which cost me many hours as I thought it was just my problem. It is my understanding that this problem has been resolved so transfer should be up to expectations for 2021. Thanks for a great tool!!!

Review.Titre: They have greatly improved by removing…
Review.Contenu: They have greatly improved by removing those scammy coin entries. Easy to follow and track your portforlia

The product is great and in the past the service has been quite good, but I've been reaching out for weeks now with a support issue and have gotten no response.  Kind of frustrating when I see that all of the positive reviews from the last few days have gotten responses from Cointracker.  If resources are limited, please focus more on customer support instead of Trust Pilot reviews.  ............This is my update on Feb 26.  My issue arose on Jan 25th.  I reached out immediately and more than once.  I wrote this review on feb 18th.  Corporate taxes are due soon.  I still don't understand why you are staffed in such a way that review responses are immediate, but customer service responses now take over a month.

Review.Titre: your service is very useful and saves a…
Review.Contenu: your service is very useful and saves a lot of time however it's difficult adding while it sometimes and i wish you had the website fixed so i could get the deal before the expiration date before tax deadline

Review.Titre: Does exactly what I need it to do.

Review.Contenu: Overall, I've had a fine experiencing using this as my main portfolio tracker. It's very useful, even in the free edition, which is a bonus. I have never bought it's premium features for tax purposes, since I'm only a retail investor and it wouldn't be necessary for me. I've used it for about a year and a half, or so.My only complaints are as follows: The "Add Wallet" feature is certainly fine but it can be frustrating when it somehow cannot add wallets, or certain blockchains not being supported. On a couple of occasions, because I couldn't add the wallets, I ended up manually entering the transactions and it was fine but very time consuming and it made me feel like I was back, tracking my coins on CMC or Coingecko again.It's a pretty great little app and I like that it's always in real time. The daily portfolio updates are nice in general just in case something drastic happens when you're not paying attention.It just feels good to have a huge tracking of my portfolio through an expanse of wallets. That's a big bonus but it's not perfect by any means. You might be frustratedly sitting there, adding transactions manually for a while but when it works, it works.

They offer me to a dashboard showing all my assets distributed in several wallets including custody wallets. Their interface and functions are rather simple, but it makes me happy because I just want to check my crypto portfolio.

Review.Titre: This is a very useful program. It simplifies everything at a glance.
Review.Contenu: This is a very useful program.

Its always been a good app and the instructions are solid. With time I have figured things out. Thanks.

Very pratique est simple , a comprendre a+++

Review.Titre: Easy to use customer service is very…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use customer service is very helpful. Been using for taxes the last 4 yrs.
Good notification, nice graphics and good access to most exchanges.

Review.Titre: I tried the contact page several times
Review.Contenu: UPDATE 4/2The co. has reached out and we are in the process of resolving my issues.  To be fair, some of the information on the Dashboard of the site can be misleading/confusing. I've upgraded from 1 star to 4 stars because of the effort they've made to resolve this & allowing for some confusion on my end (waiting for clarification on that part).  I tried the contact page several times, it doesn't go through. There is a phone number on my paid subscription confirmation email but it tells you to go to the site and use contact us.  Which I tried several times and it never goes through, the arrow just keeps spinning.The site is not adding up my fiat deposits correctly, it is also not adjusting my gains/losses correctly.  I hope someone from the company can contact me. I just did my 2020 tax year gain/loss and am wondering if it was even correct.   I don't like leaving bad reviews, but companies using the excuse that crypto is a "new industry" and we are experiencing substantial growth, please bear with us is just not an excuse anymore.  They're should be a phone number, even if no one is picking it up, to leave a message and someone gets back to you.  You guys really can't find operators to answer your phones?? Or you just don't want to spend the money??    I have 29 days to cancel my 2021 subscription, BUT, it doesn't even have a cancellation page, at least not one that I can find. If a company is entering an industry with a huge growth potential than you should have all your ducks in a row to deal with that growth!!  There are plenty of people at home unemployed at the moment unfortunately, I'm sure some of them have customer service experience.Sorry, don't mean to go on, but I've had this problem with one of the largest crypto exchanges in the USA and it took 5 weeks to even get an answer from them after being locked out of my account, luckily I was able to figure out how to get around the issue and after a week was back in, but with zero help from them.The service is not cheap $199, extremely disappointing at this point.  Hopefully I can resolve this and change my rating. Thank youRay03/29/21UPDATE 03/30/21Received an email from the company & hoping they can resolve my issues.  Not about canceling, it's about receiving support for serious issues & the complexity of reaching out to the company. thank you

CoinTracker has provided to me a more detailed narrative of the background in taxes, numbers, and information in general. It has enhanced the guidelines of the importance of taxes, including cryptocurrency reviews and portfolio additions.

Review.Contenu: So easy and convenient to use! It summarizes all of your short and long term gains for each tax year into an easy to read report and even generates a fully completed Tax Form 8949 for insertion directly into your personal tax return. What could be easier than that? I love it and my accountant loves it!

Time saver:   If you trade crypto, then you need this.  Otherwise, it will take weeks to figure out how much you earned in the past year.  Its improved, and much better than the past, including cust. service
They are constantly striving to improve their services, and they listen to their customers.

Currently using the free tier, and it is superb! Great way to keep track of multiple exchange transactions in one place. Will make my tax returns a piece of cake! Loving the new dark theme too - way better. Overall the best crypto asset tracker available - keep up the great work! Highly recommended.

Cointracker has made very recent improvements with tracking wallets. Problems with Uphold wallet have been fixed and I'm happy. Please keep these updates going.

It was a life saver when filing my taxes.  I felt confident that it captured all of my Coinbase transactions and that my tax liability was calculated correctly.  It imported into my tax software easily as well.

is wonderful to us

Review.Titre: Sign up now. You'll be happier in April.
Review.Contenu: The ease of filing crypto capital gains and losses with Coin Tracker reporting is a marvel. I have a Tuck MBA in finance and accounting and this service shoulders the load for me. I strongly encourage participation.
Love it.  I get regular emails informing me of my

So far the best crypto tracking app I have used with many automated imports and nice clean UI. Everyone can give it a try on free plan, which is quite handy on its own and decide for advanced features like tax reporting later / when needed.

It has made it extremely easy for me to file my taxes at the end of the year without having to weed through piles of documents and e-mail confirmations to figure out what transactions and earnings I had/made during the year.  I could never have filed my taxes last year without CoinTrackers reports.

Review.Contenu: I have absolutely no complaints about CoinTrackers as well as and I would need to ad Coin Base. Great process for preparing tax situations. Thank You!

Review.Titre: I have been with the crypto currency…
Review.Contenu: I have been with the crypto currency since 2018, spent many, many hours researching and investing. I could not understand why my portfolio was always had a zero balance.  Cointracker is the only company who has been able to track my assets. Finally I am relieved, all my hard work paid off. I definitely recommend this app, I was on the verge of quiting.  Cointracker is the reason I stuck with it . It feels great knowing there on track,  now I know all the time spent was worth it.

Review.Titre: Cointracker does a great job of tracking holdings and returns
Review.Contenu: Cointracker does a great job of aggregating my crypto holdings and tracking my returns.   I'm not an active trader, but in years where I've got trading activity I've used their tax computation service:  having attempted it by hand in the past, I can say it is REALLY helpful.
With the notifications I can view how exactly I'm doing. Easy to use, very simple and intuitive.
Best way to track all my wallets and exchange portfolios

cointracker has improved drastically over the last few years. It has the most accurate tax treatment of any crypto tax solution out there. I really appreciate that cointracker makes my crypto taxes so easy!

I reached out to support at Cointracker and Anthony, via many emails, resolved the issue.  I was able to generate the appropriate tax form which made our CPA very happy.  I highly recommend Cointracker which interfaces with Coinbase Pro!  Tom Lamphere

Big fan of Cointracker. Been using a few years now. Easy to connect wallets. Simple dashboard. Tax summaries. Real time prices. Essentially it's my go to one stop shop.

Excellent customer serviceThis software is great for tracking all your crypto transactions and makes tax season a breeze. The customer support is top notch as well. I'll be using Cointracker for all of my crypto tracking + tax docs from here on out!

Review.Titre: Seamless Crypto Management and Exceptional Tax Support - A Game Changer!
Review.Contenu: As an avid crypto investor, navigating the complexities of portfolio management and tax compliance can be daunting. However, my experience with CoinTracker has been nothing short of revolutionary. This tool has transformed the way I handle my crypto investments, making it an indispensable asset in my financial toolkit.User-Friendly Interface: CoinTracker's user interface is a standout feature. It's intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy for me, a non-tech savvy investor, to track my investments across various exchanges and wallets. The real-time updates on prices and performance metrics are displayed in a clear, concise manner, allowing me to make informed decisions quickly.Comprehensive Asset Tracking: The platform supports an extensive range of cryptocurrencies and integrates seamlessly with over 300 wallets and exchanges. This broad compatibility means I can manage all my crypto assets in one place, a convenience that has simplified my investment process significantly.Accurate Tax Reporting: CoinTracker excels in tax reporting. It automatically generates the necessary tax documents, which are accurate and easy to understand. This feature has saved me countless hours of manual work, especially during the tax season, and given me peace of mind knowing that my tax reporting is compliant with the latest regulations.Responsive Customer Support: Despite some online feedback about customer service issues, my personal experience with CoinTracker's support team has been very positive. They've been responsive and helpful, addressing my queries promptly and effectively.Enhanced Investment Insights: The daily email alerts and detailed performance breakdowns for individual assets have been a game-changer. They keep me informed about my portfolio's health and help me make timely adjustments to my investment strategy.Final Thoughts: CoinTracker is more than just a portfolio tracker; it's a comprehensive solution for managing crypto investments and tax obligations. Its ease of use, extensive cryptocurrency support, and reliable tax features make it an invaluable tool for both novice and experienced investors in the crypto space. I highly recommend CoinTracker to anyone looking to streamline their crypto investment management and tax reporting processes.
